title: [Bank of Ta'Illistim Exchange]
description: The small cottage that serves as the city's exchange booth clearly is often visited, as the stone flooring underfoot has been deeply worn in a path from the door to the clerk's desk.  An engraved mithglin sign is mounted upon the wall behind the desk.

The ground level of the tower which serves as the city's exchange is clearly often visited, as the stone flooring underfoot has been deeply worn in a path from the door to the clerk's desk.  An engraved silver sign is mounted upon the wall behind the desk.
